Name: Banadir
Description: The region surrounding the capital city, Mogadishu, and includes important coastal areas.

Name: Awdal
Description: A region in the northwest, known for its agricultural production and proximity to the Red Sea.

Name: Bari
Description: Located in the northeastern part of Somalia, known for its coastline along the Gulf of Aden.

Name: Galguduud
Description: A central region known for its dry climate and the strategic town of Dhusamareb.

Name: Hiran
Description: A region in central Somalia, known for its agricultural and livestock activities.

Name: Jubaland
Description: A southern region with a strategic location near Kenya, known for its ports and pastoralism.

Name: Mudug
Description: A region in central Somalia, with diverse landscapes from desert to coastal areas.

Name: Sool
Description: A region in the northern part of Somalia, known for its mountainous terrain and disputes with Somaliland.

Name: Togdheer
Description: A region in the northwest, known for its agricultural production, especially crops and livestock.

Name: Woqooyi Galbeed
Description: Located in the northwestern part of Somalia, with the capital in Hargeisa, part of Somaliland.
